Player History
Drafted in 27th round, 429th overall pick, by St. Louis (C) in 2015...
Had first career hit (double) on 7/15/2015, off Michael Coronel (PHI)...
Was claimed off waivers by San Francisco on 8/10/2015.
1/31/2016: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 9/20/2016 with a Strained Hamstring Muscle, out for 2 weeks...
1/31/2017: Gets a new one-year contract worth $550,000 through salary arbitration...
Hit first career homerun on 4/11/2017, off George Coletti (STL)...
Injured on 4/11/2017 with a Concussion, out for one week...
Signed as a free agent by St. Louis (C) on 2/5/2018 to a 2-year deal worth $1,485,004 per year...
